item.title: [SOLVED]Identifier expected in script
item.dc:creator: @roboy roboy
item.description:
@roboy wrote:

Still same error, but thanks anyway for the fast response.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2009, 05:11:10 am[/size][hr]I found the error, and now everything is working as usual. I feel a bit stupid now, I had put the whole getcolor thingy in the wrong order

CurCombatMode:=getcolor(x,y)
That is how it should look

item.title: [SOLVED]Identifier expected in script
item.dc:creator: @roboy roboy
item.description:
@roboy wrote:

I am making a bot, and during a procedure I get this error:

Line 52: [Error] (52:14): Identifier expected in script C:\Program Files (x86)\SCAR 3.20\Scripts\RSScript.scar
The procedures looks like this:
Procedure CombatCheck; begin SendKeysSilent(chr(9)); wait (500); SendKeysSilent(chr(52)); wait (300); SendKeysSilent(chr(81)); FindColor(x,y,CombatColor,0,0,1132,51); repeat GetColor(x,y):CurCombatMode; until CurCombatMode = NonCombatColor; end;
I am using Scar Divi CDE 3.20d and have downloaded all available includes, I am kinda new to Scar and I guess I have done some thing very wrong here. The whole other script is working it's just this special procedure that is causing trouble. I have tried comment marking GetColor(x,y):CurCombatMode; and then it compiles and runs. Appreciating any help :)

Read full topic
